sentences.sentence: Sestet: the six-line stanza. 3couplets/ a quatrain + a couplet/ 2 triplets.
sentences.translation: 六行诗节：三个对句或一个四行诗节加一个对句，或两个三联对。

sentences.sentence: The seven-character quatrain is one of the most representative forms of the Tang poetry.
sentences.translation: 七言绝句是唐代诗歌中最具代表性的体裁之一。

sentences.sentence: From that time on, he would now and then ask me to complete a quatrain by adding a couplet of my own to one given by him.
sentences.translation: 从那时起，他时不时地叫我去完成一首四行诗，把我自己写的对句添加在他给我的对句后面。
